class.name: br.com.linkdata.entity.LogOperation
class.meta: public LogOperation() { } public LogOperation(String method) { setMethod(method); setSuccess(false); setDate(new Date()); } public LogOperation(String method, boolean success) { setMethod(method); setSuccess(success); setDate(new Date()); }
